name: Urban Area
uniques: Gain control over [all] tiles in a [1]-tile radius
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [3] to [6] neighboring [Urban Area] tiles>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+40 Gold]

name: Beach Resort
uniques: Can only be built on [Coastal] tiles

name: Industrial Farm

Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Industrial Farm] tiles>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+30 Gold]
